amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for salaries and expenses for Financial Crimes Enforcement Network by $3,339,000 and reduces funding for the Federal Buildings Fund at GSA by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for salaries and expenses for Financial Crimes Enforcement Network by $3,339,000 and to reduce funding for the Federal Buildings Fund at GSA by a $3,339,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Lynch.
